projects.desc: This test automation is based on Robot Framework with the selenium library.

projects.desc: This project is build on the top of the django and the graphene(A query language for API). We have used the django-extension to runscript which loads data from json.

projects.title: SpotifyApi
projects.desc: It is a class based client Api. It makes multiple get request with the spotify to search songs, album, artist and the tracks..

projects.desc: This project will make user's portfolio. These portfolio's are dynamic with tons of templates and gradient colours which changes on every refresh. This project is backend with django framework.

projects.title: Shoty
projects.desc: Music website based on the top on Django framework. It is a dynamic website with responsive behaviour. It has a login feature and CRUD (create,read,update and the delete) feaures.

projects.title: AutoInsta
projects.desc: It is a python script which automate the working of instagram account. It provides varoius feature such as auto removing following, removing following that are not follower and downloading the medi…

projects.title: QuotesTutorial
projects.desc: This is a scraper which scrapes the quotes on the website using the scrapy framework

projects.title: Competitive-Programming
projects.desc: It contains questions from various online and offline platforms such as Hackerrank, Coding Ninjas, Codeforces, Leetcode, Codeforces etc

projects.title: home

projects.title: StackOverflowScrapper
projects.desc: This project aims to scraps questions depending on the fields, no of pages and question size. It makes a file with required tag. You can edit the filename easily.

projects.title: FlaskTweepy
projects.desc: This bot will extract the data from the the twitter and display the whole information like followers, following, likes and retweets. It displays all the tweets from your timeline.

projects.desc: Simple Chart JS graph built with the help of Html,CSS and JavaScript.

projects.desc: This is basic todo app built on react native with the help of expo client. It uses the concept of components and useState in react.

projects.title: Pokemon
